column1: Smoque BBQ////Holy Smoques. Been here many many times and it never disappoints. Most recently
column2: my lunch partner and I shared a brisket platter with cornbread
column7: and peach cobbler. Everything was delectable.  The peach cobbler is silly good
column8: like about to have a crisis good.  All of the meat we had (which was a lot) was tender and juicy.
